Name: Weapons Genius VR
About the game: You are a weapon genius. You know everything about the gun mechanisms, ballistics, shooting skills and other. You must create ever better and improved guns and earn money through accurate shooting. Select and buy the necessary details in order to combine the weapon properties and achieve the maximal performance of fire efficiency. Create a gun of your dream!
